name: GanaBlade
description:
This is a fast-paced, hot barrage shooting game.
Destroy all kinds of enemy planes with powerful firepower and skills, and shuttle and evade in the sky full of barrages.
Shuttle through the vast universe, colorful scenes planets, fire stars, wood stars, water stars, huge battleships.
It's time to drive a space fighter and show your strength! !

feature:
– Take you back to the nostalgic retro pixel style of the 1990s, do you still remember the little friends, home consoles and arcade scenes in those years
– An epic vertical scrolling space journey awaits you!
– A variety of weapons and skills, such as lasers, shields, lightning, homing bullets, flames, etc., to defeat various bosses and perfectly avoid their barrage attacks
– The music is also in retro 8bit style! !

QQ group: 884611138
